GenotypeGraph

Class WeightedGenotypeGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
      • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
        • GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph

  • public class WeightedGenotypeGraph
extends GenotypeGraphSimple
    A very simple method to add transition probabilities to a genotype graph
    Author:
    rossi (Actually this is also a Markov Chain, TODO toMC() method)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> downWeights
      sum of weights of reachable nodes using reverse edges
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> finalWeights
      weight computed using this formula: W() = [Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(b))]/[sum_{x \in a.Adj}Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(x)]
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> upWeights
      sum of weights of reachable nodes using direct edges

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addRoot()
      Adds the clonal genotype with edges to each node without any parent as root of the graph
      private void prepareGraph() 
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> setAtNull()
      Initialization for weight lists (also used for the DP algorithms)
      private void setDownWeights()
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable (excluding itself) by any node
      private java.lang.Double setDownWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself)
      private void setFinalWeights()
      Set up weights using this formula: W() = [Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(b))]/[sum_{x \in a.Adj}Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(x)]
      private void setObservedProbabilities()
      Sets observation probabilities up for each node (P(genotype) = #count(genotype in dataset)/#sizeof(dataset)) Note: resets nodes IDs (needed for fast access to weights'lists)
      private void setUpWeights()
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable (excluding itself) by any node following reverse edges
      private java.lang.Double setUpWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself) following reverse edges
      void toDotNode(GenotypeNode node)
      prints a node in dot format
      MarkovChain toMC()
      Creates a MarkovChain object based on this graph (in fact this graph is already a Markov Chain)

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightedGenotypeGraph

        public WeightedGenotypeGraph(java.lang.String[] labels,
                             java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> genotypes)
        Default constructor, enriches the simple genotype graph with weights
        Parameters:
        labels - HUGO symbols for genes
        genotypes - note that a single genotype is a sequence of boolean stating if a gene was or wasn't mutated (in the order defined by labels)

      • prepareGraph

        private void prepareGraph()

      • setFinalWeights

        private void setFinalWeights()
        Set up weights using this formula: W() = [Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(b))]/[sum_{x \in a.Adj}Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(x)]

      • addRoot

        private void addRoot()
        Adds the clonal genotype with edges to each node without any parent as root of the graph

      • setDownWeights

        private void setDownWeights()
        DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable (excluding itself) by any node

      • setDownWeightsRec

        private java.lang.Double setDownWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
        DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself)
        Parameters:
        node - starting point
        Returns:
        sum of weights of nodes reachable by node (including itself)

      • setUpWeights

        private void setUpWeights()
        DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable (excluding itself) by any node following reverse edges

      • setUpWeightsRec

        private java.lang.Double setUpWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
        DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself) following reverse edges
        Parameters:
        node - starting point
        Returns:
        sum of weights of nodes reachable by node (including itself) following reverse edges

      • setObservedProbabilities

        private void setObservedProbabilities()
        Sets observation probabilities up for each node (P(genotype) = #count(genotype in dataset)/#sizeof(dataset)) Note: resets nodes IDs (needed for fast access to weights'lists)

      • setAtNull

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> setAtNull()
        Initialization for weight lists (also used for the DP algorithms)
        Returns:
        a list containing a null for each node

        public MarkovChain toMC()
